list.name: Changes
list.comment: #fix #jsx #npm Added new expense and finance components, updated imports in index.jsx, changed text for clarity, and added new paths and elements to menu items and package files, adding dependencies and peer dependencies for react-apexcharts and apexcharts, and new modules for functionality SVG. Updated workspace and project settings XML file, added new configuration routes and menu items for company information, payment integration, security policies and zip code.

task.summary: #fix #jsx Add new configuration routes and menu items for company information, payment integration, security policies, and zip code, update workspace XML file and project settings.

#fix #jsx A refactoring component that includes a new email template module and pagination functionality, updates to communications, ticket routing and menu items, and customization of project settings in the workspace XML.
